title: [app.lemlist.com] Improper handling of payment lead to bypass payment
content:
Summary:
Hello Team,
I truly hope it treats you awesomely on your side of the screen :)
due to improper handling of payment methods, an attacker can easily bypass the payment and benefit from a paid plan.
Steps To Reproduce:
Log to your account
Go to the billing page
Fill in the address tab
Go to the next tab Payment Card
Now the interesting step Make sure you don't have any money on your credit card
Chose Email outreach and wait until you get a notification that the payment is failed
Next increase the number of seats for example 50
Again you will get a notification that the payment is failed
Now Cancel the subscription
Now I can use the paid features without paying anything.
POC
<image_0>
Impact
I think the impact is pretty obvious, an attacker can use paid plans without paying anything.
if you need more info feel free to ping me
best Regards
@omarelfarsaoui
steps: Proceed to the Payment Card tab
Ensure your credit card has insufficient funds
Select Email outreach and wait for payment failure notification
Increase the number of seats (e.g., to 50)
Wait for another payment failure notification
Observe that paid features are now accessible without payment
vuln_description: Due to improper handling of payment methods, an attacker can bypass payment and access paid features by exploiting payment failure scenarios and subscription cancellation.
reason: The attack involves straightforward steps without requiring deep understanding of complex interactions or novel logic. The vulnerability arises from a simple oversight in payment state handling after failures and cancellation.
